front.title: Extensible Provisioning Protocol (EPP) mapping for DELEG records

abstract.t: This document describes an extension to the Extensible Provisioning Protocol ([STD69]) which allows clients to provision DELEG records for domain names. About this draft This note is to be removed before publishing as an RFC. The source for this draft, and an issue tracker, may can be found at https://github.com/gbxyz/epp-deleg-extension.
